description: Dashboard for monitoring of Prometheus v2.x.x

panels.content:
Two rows bellow can serve as example if you are running **Prometheus** in **Kubernetes** and uses **Heapster** with **InfluxDB**.

The schema and queries are very hard to generalize so you will have to tweak them but I leave them here for inspiration.
panels.title: Heapster rows

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")/1000 as "usage_rate.mean"  FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")/1000 as "usage_rate.mean"  FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 as "CPU LIMIT"  FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") as "usage_rate.mean"  FROM "memory/usage" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") as "usage_rate.mean"  FROM "memory/usage" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "CPU LIMIT"  FROM "memory/limit" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "container_name" =~ /prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY container_name, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "rx_rate.mean "  FROM "network/rx_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "rx_rate.mean"  FROM "network/rx_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*-1 as "tx_rate.mean "  FROM "network/tx_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*-1 as "tx_rate.mean"  FROM "network/tx_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  labels, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "rx_errors_rate.mean"  FROM "network/rx_errors_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter AND "value">0 GROUP BY  labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "rx_errors_rate.mean"  FROM "network/rx_errors_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter AND "value">0 GROUP BY  labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "tx_errors_rate.mean"  FROM "network/rx_errors_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter AND "value">0 GROUP BY  labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "tx_errors_rate.mean"  FROM "network/rx_errors_rate"  WHERE  "labels" =~ /app:prometheus/ AND $timeFilter AND "value">0 GROUP BY  labels,  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "DISK_USAGE.mean "  FROM "filesystem/usage" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "DISK_USAGE.mean "  FROM "filesystem/usage" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "DISK_LIMIT.mean "  FROM "filesystem/limit" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "DISK_LIMIT.mean"  FROM "filesystem/limit" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "FREE_INODES.mean "  FROM "filesystem/inodes_free" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "FREE_INODES.mean"  FROM "filesystem/inodes_free" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "USED_INODES.mean "  FROM "filesystem/inodes" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as "USED_INODES.mean"  FROM "filesystem/inodes" WHERE  "labels" =~ /data-prometheus:true/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: Prometheus2.0
